id.description: (required) A unique identifier for the resource

locationSet.$comment: See location-conflation documentation for compatible values: https://github.com/ideditor/location-conflation#readme
locationSet.description: (required) included and excluded locations for this resource

name.$comment: Assumed to be in English, this value will be sent to Transifex for translation
name.description: (required) Display name for this imagery source

description.$comment: Assumed to be in English, this value will be sent to Transifex for translation
description.description: (required) One line description of the imagery source

extendedDescription.$comment: Assumed to be in English, this value will be sent to Transifex for translation
extendedDescription.description: (optional) Longer description of the imagery source

url.description: (required) A url template for the imagery source

countryCoder.$comment: See country-coder documentation for compatible values: https://github.com/ideditor/country-coder#readme
countryCoder.description: A country code (ISO 3166-1, United Nations M49, or anything recognized by country-coder)

coordinatePair.description: A coordinate pair formatted as [longitude, latitude]

geojsonFilename.description: A filename for one of the geojson features in this project
